divs: Sighting DetailsWe were performing a night maneuver of arming and disarming anti tank mines,whenI heard murmuring within the group(battalion)I looked up and saw approximatelyfifty or more lights similar to stars flying in circles,shooting across andstopping without any effect of inertia.They seem to maneuver like fireflies.Wecould not complete our assigned maneuvers and were ordered in formation for themarch back to the base.Our sergeant in charge ordered us not to mention thesightingto anyone at the base.We were all awestruck and as we left the area wenoticed the ufos were still flying above that localized area of maneuver and didnot follow.This has always been a distinct and bothersome memory to me ...Imglad to finally share it.Its unknown to me if any others in my group had everreported it...hopefully they have.
